content: this is a collaboration i did with with louie of **club crochet** 1 and louie s loops 2 full blog post here https //geekyhooker com/chubzilla-roar/ you re free to sell finished products you make from my patterns but copying and distributing the patterns themselves is prohibited just credit me @geekyhooker and link back to the pattern if you sell online tag me in your photos on social media i love seeing how everything turns out
